title: Low-Variance Policy Gradient Estimation with World Models

sections.world models: VPN simulates multi-step returns to approximate and backup the Q-values over a horizon [ref]25. Ha et al.  uses evolutionary approaches to search for policy in the compact WM representation of the environment. Similarly, PLANET  uses non-differentiable optimization to plan within the learned WM. Value iteration was successfully applied to learned WM representations . MuZero [ref]26 leverages the learned WM to perform Monte-Carlo tree search in the latent representation. SimPLe  and Dreamer [ref]9 calculate the policy gradient with trajectories imagined by the WM.
